name: Mount Moriah

trails_config.name: Carter-Moriah Trail
trails_config.description: Leads to a rocky summit with exceptional 360-degree views of the Presidential Range and the Wild River Wilderness. Features the beautiful ledge views from Mt. Surprise.
trails_config.parking_info: Carter-Moriah Trailhead, Bangor St, Gorham, NH

current_conditions.ai_summary: A spectacular hike located in New Hampshire. Standing at 4049 feet, Mount Moriah offers breathtaking views and a rewarding challenge for hikers of all levels.
risk_factors: Check local trail conditions before departing.
Start early to avoid afternoon storms.

generated_description:
The Experience

Standing at 4049 feet, Mount Moriah is a standout peak in New Hampshire. Known for its approachable and scenic terrain, it offers a quintessential hiking experience.

The Challenge

Hikers often choose the **Carter-Moriah Trail**, a **9.0 mile** route gaining significant elevation. As part of the **NH48 4000-Footers**, it draws peak-baggers from across the region.

Peak Bagging Logic

**Peak Bagging Opportunity:** Consider connecting this hike with **Middle Carter Mountain**, which is just 3.8 miles away. Linking these peaks is a popular way to maximize your day on the trail.
